All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Database
The Database class is responsible for establishing a connection to a MySQL database, initializing the database schema if necessary, and executing SQL queries.
LogFileHandler
Sets up the logger to write to a file.
LoggerAbstraction
This class is an abstraction of the java.util.logging.Logger class.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Text Analyzer application.
MainController
This is the controller for the MainView.fxml file.
MainController.DataModel
This class is used to create the data model for the table.
SetupController
SetupController is the controller class responsible for managing the setup view of the Text Analyzer application.
TextAnalyzerCore
This class handles the core functionality for the Text Analyzer application.
TextAnalyzerGui
TextAnalyzerGui is the main GUI class for the Text Analyzer application.
ViewManager
The ViewManager class is a utility class responsible for managing the JavaFX views in the application.
